title: Here's What You Can Do Now To Retire Earlier Than Expected
text: If you’ve ever been at a dinner party or coffee date and heard someone talk about their steadily growing retirement fund, you are probably very familiar with the sense of panic that can quickly rise in your chest. “I’m supposed to have how much saved right now?” you ask yourself. Sometimes it seems like as soon as you get a handle on your savings in general, a reminder that you’re not saving in exactly the right way or for the right things comes along quickly after. But panicking about money never helped anyone, so try to take some deep breaths and read advice from the experts. Think of it this way: You don’t have to have $100,000 saved overnight. You only have to take the first step in learning about how to save. And that’s as simple as reading an article or two. So if you’re a beginner to the whole retirement savings thing, here’s some quick, easy-to-follow advice from people who know exactly how to.
